entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 a.m. ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 7:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
